description.value: You can transform yourself or the bodies of others to express your displeasure. Once per day, you can cast either @UUID[Compendium.xprpg.spells-srd.Aerial Form]{Aerial Form} or @UUID[Compendium.xprpg.spells-srd.Baleful Polymorph]{Baleful Polymorph} as a 7th-level primal innate spell. You must take the form of a bird when using this aerial form.
